rdf:Description.dc:title: A bibliography of Alberta ornithology : natural histroy occasional paper no. 16 1991
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Ealey, D. M.
McNicholl, Martin K.
Provincial Museum of Alberta. Natural History Section.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, Alberta : Natural History Section, Provincial Museum of Alberta,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Bibliography lists 7444 references of unpublished and published reports, articles and books relating to the ornithology of Alberta, up to and including 1989. Includes all those listed in the first edition published as Provincial Museum of Alberta Natural History occasional paper no. 3 in 1981, with corrections, plus additional information as keywords. Indices for authors, subject, species and geographical location follow the main compilation.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Ornithology
